org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop.impl.igfs

Class HadoopIgfsInProc

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop.impl.igfs.HadoopIgfsInProc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HadoopIgfs, HadoopIgfsEx

    public class HadoopIgfsInProc
extends Object
implements HadoopIgfsEx
    Communication with grid in the same process.

      • create

        public static HadoopIgfsInProc create(String igfsName,
                                      org.apache.commons.logging.Log log,
                                      String userName)
        Creates instance of the HadoopIgfsInProcWithIgniteRefsCount by IGFS name.
        Parameters:
        igfsName - Target IGFS name.
        log - Log.
        userName - User name.
        Returns:
        HadoopIgfsInProcWithIgniteRefsCount instance. null if the IGFS not fount in the current VM.

        igfsName - Target IGFS name.
        log - Log.
        userName - User name.
        Returns:

      • create

        public HadoopIgfsStreamDelegate create(IgfsPath path,
                                       boolean overwrite,
                                       boolean colocate,
                                       int replication,
                                       long blockSize,
                                       @Nullable
                                       Map<String,String> props)
                                throws IgniteCheckedException
        Command to create file and open it for output.
        Specified by:
        create in interface HadoopIgfs
        Parameters:
        path - Path to file.
        overwrite - If true then old file contents will be lost.
        colocate - If true and called on data node, file will be written on that node.
        replication - Replication factor.
        props - File properties for creation.
        Returns:
        Stream descriptor.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

        Specified by:
        append in interface HadoopIgfs
        Parameters:
        path - Path to file.
        create - If true, file will be created if does not exist.

        Stream descriptor.

      • readData

        public IgniteInternalFuture<byte[]> readData(HadoopIgfsStreamDelegate delegate,
                                             long pos,
                                             int len,
                                             @Nullable
                                             byte[] outBuf,
                                             int outOff,
                                             int outLen)
        Asynchronously reads specified amount of bytes from opened input stream.
        Specified by:
        readData in interface HadoopIgfsEx
        Parameters:
        delegate - Stream delegate.
        pos - Position to read from.
        len - Data length to read.
        outBuf - Optional output buffer. If buffer length is less then len, all remaining bytes will be read into new allocated buffer of length {len - outBuf.length} and this buffer will be the result of read future.
        outOff - Output offset.
        outLen - Output length.
        Returns:
        Read data.

      • writeData

        public void writeData(HadoopIgfsStreamDelegate delegate,
                      byte[] data,
                      int off,
                      int len)
               throws IOException
        Writes data to the stream with given streamId. This method does not return any future since no response to write request is sent.
        Specified by:
        writeData in interface HadoopIgfsEx
        Parameters:
        delegate - Stream delegate.
        data - Data to write.
        off - Offset.
        len - Length.
        Throws:
        IOException - If failed.

      • addEventListener

        public void addEventListener(HadoopIgfsStreamDelegate delegate,
                             HadoopIgfsStreamEventListener lsnr)
        Adds event listener that will be invoked when connection with server is lost or remote error has occurred. If connection is closed already, callback will be invoked synchronously inside this method.
        Specified by:
        addEventListener in interface HadoopIgfsEx
        Parameters:

        lsnr - Event listener.
